about.title: About me
about.description:
I am a junior Full Stack Developer with a background in Multiplatform Application Development (DAM), passionate about creating innovative digital solutions. I currently work as an IT Support Technician in corporate environments, providing hardware and software support and managing incidents across Windows systems, Active Directory, and Office 365.

I combine technical skills, creativity, and a results-driven mindset to continuously grow and add value to every project.
about.specialization: Specialized in Mobile, Web and Machine Learning
experienceBullets1: Technical support to corporate users (N1 and N2) in SEAT environment
Hardware/software support on Windows: configuration, maintenance and troubleshooting
User, group and permission administration in Active Directory
Microsoft 365 support: Outlook, Teams and OneDrive
Work with ITIL procedures and focus on service quality
experienceBullets2: Writing and maintaining internal technical documentation
Development of new features for corporate time tracking platform
Design and development of corporate website with WordPress
Creation of corporate intranet in WordPress with new features
about.educationPlace1: Institut Tecnològic de Barcelona (ITB) · Barcelona, Spain
educationBullets1: Training focused on multiplatform development and full stack solutions
Languages: Java, Kotlin, Python, JavaScript, SQL
Mobile: Android Studio with Jetpack Compose and Ktor (client/server)
Systems: domains/servers, networks, Docker and AWS services
Quality: testing with JUnit, debugging and technical documentation
educationBullets2: Intensive program based on projects and peer-learning
Piscine passed: C, algorithms and data structures
Git for version control and collaborative work
Focus on problem solving, logic and teamwork
Methodology without traditional classes, autonomy and continuous improvement

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of my most recent work

todo-list-app.title: Task Management Application - Modern To Do List
todo-list-app.shortDescription: Modern and responsive web application for task management with glassmorphism design and local persistence.
todo-list-app.fullDescription: Complete web task management application built with HTML5, CSS3, and vanilla JavaScript. Implements a modern design with glassmorphism effects, color-coded task categorization, completion marking, and persistence system using localStorage. The interface is fully responsive and offers a smooth user experience with dynamic interactions and attractive visual design.
features: Add, edit and delete tasks with intuitive form
Color categorization (Personal, Work, Health, etc.)
Mark tasks as completed with visual animation
Data persistence in browser's localStorage
Responsive design compatible with mobile, tablets and desktop
Glassmorphism effects for a modern and professional look
Drag-and-drop interface for task reorganization
challenges: Implement data persistence without backend using localStorage efficiently
Design a visually attractive interface with glassmorphism that worked well on different backgrounds
Manage application state only with vanilla JavaScript without frameworks
Optimize dynamic DOM rendering to maintain good performance
learnings: Advanced DOM manipulation with vanilla JavaScript without external dependencies
LocalStorage implementation for client-side data persistence
Modern interface design with CSS3 (glassmorphism, gradients, animations)
SPA (Single Page Application) development without frameworks
UX/UI design principles for productivity applications
State management in frontend applications with pure JavaScript

hospital-del-mar-app.title: Educational Project Management Platform - Hospital del Mar
hospital-del-mar-app.shortDescription: Native Android app for educational project management with bidirectional evaluation and progress visualization.
hospital-del-mar-app.fullDescription: Educational Android platform developed for Hospital del Mar in Barcelona that facilitates the management of student projects and bidirectional evaluation between teachers and students. Includes secure authentication, differentiated user roles (student/teacher), real-time progress visualization, evaluation system with customizable criteria, and modern architecture with Jetpack Compose and Ktor for client-server communication.
features: Robust authentication system with persistent session management
Differentiated roles: teacher view (full management) and student (viewing/tracking)
Creation, editing and visualization of educational projects with complete details
Bidirectional evaluation system with customizable criteria and detailed feedback
Individual and group progress visualization with dynamic charts
Modern and native interface built with Jetpack Compose
Client-server communication via Ktor with REST API
Local data persistence and cloud synchronization
challenges: Implement a complex evaluation system with multiple criteria and differentiated roles
Design a scalable client-server architecture with Ktor for efficient request management
Synchronize data between devices and server maintaining consistency and offline availability
Build a complex native UI with Jetpack Compose respecting Material Design 3
Manage authentication states and sessions securely on Android client
learnings: Modern Android development with Jetpack Compose for declarative UIs
REST API implementation with Ktor (server and HTTP client)
MVVM architecture on Android with StateFlow and ViewModel
Authentication and authorization management in mobile applications
Adaptive interface design with Material Design 3
Complex state management and navigation in Jetpack Compose
Local persistence with Room Database and backend synchronization

ai-chatbot-fullstack.title: Multi-Provider AI Chatbot - Full Stack Application
ai-chatbot-fullstack.shortDescription: Full-stack web application with intelligent chat, multi-provider AI integration (OpenAI/Gemini) and secure authentication.
ai-chatbot-fullstack.fullDescription: Full-stack intelligent chat web application with modern architecture integrating multiple AI providers (OpenAI GPT and Google Gemini). The frontend is developed with React and TypeScript, the backend with Node.js/Express, and uses Firebase for authentication and real-time database. Users can create conversations, switch between AI models, customize chatbot experience, and manage their complete chat history with a modern ChatGPT-like interface.
features: Secure user authentication via Firebase Authentication (email/password)
Integration with OpenAI GPT-4 and Google Gemini for intelligent responses
Dynamic AI model selector (OpenAI or Gemini) with real-time switching
Complete conversation management: create, delete, rename and organize chats
Persistent conversation history saved in Firebase Realtime Database
Modern and responsive chat interface with Markdown formatting for responses
Response streaming system for smooth user experience
Settings panel to customize model and chatbot parameters
challenges: Integrate multiple AI APIs (OpenAI and Gemini) with unified logic and robust error handling
Implement real-time response streaming from backend to frontend
Design an efficient conversation management system with Firebase Realtime Database
Handle secure authentication and user state management in React/Firebase
Optimize user experience to maintain fluidity in long conversations
Protect API keys in backend and manage rate limits from providers
learnings: Full-stack development with React (TypeScript), Node.js and Express
AI API integration: OpenAI GPT-4 and Google Gemini
Authentication and user management with Firebase Authentication
Real-time database with Firebase Realtime Database
HTTP streaming implementation for progressive responses
Global state management in React with Context API
Modern conversational interface design (chat UX)
Security in full-stack applications: API key protection, CORS and validation

dev-portfolio.title: Professional Developer Portfolio - Multi-Language
dev-portfolio.shortDescription: Professional web portfolio with multi-language support (ES, EN), modern design and project management.
dev-portfolio.fullDescription: Professional web portfolio for developers built with React, TypeScript, Vite and Tailwind CSS. Features a modern, responsive and fully bilingual (Spanish and English) design with custom translation system via Context API. Includes sections for personal presentation, work experience, academic background, featured projects with individual detail pages, downloadable CV, and contact form. All optimized for performance and SEO.
features: Complete internationalization (i18n) system with Spanish and English support
Mobile-first responsive design compatible with all devices
Projects section with filters by category (Web, Mobile, ML)
Detail pages for each project with features, challenges and learnings
Downloadable PDF CV and interactive experience/education section
Functional contact form with data validation
Smooth navigation with automatic scroll to sections
Modern UI components with shadcn-ui and Tailwind CSS
challenges: Implement a robust translation system without external libraries (i18next)
Design a scalable and maintainable component architecture with TypeScript
Create dynamic detail pages for projects with React Router routing
Optimize performance and load times with Vite and code splitting
Maintain visual consistency across all sections with coherent design system
learnings: React application development with TypeScript and modern architecture
Internationalization system implementation with Context API
Design system building with Tailwind CSS and reusable components
Routing and navigation with React Router v6
Build and performance optimization with Vite
Shadcn-ui integration for professional UI components
Global state management with React Context
Web development best practices: accessibility, SEO and responsiveness

mappsapp.title: Location-Based Services Platform - MappsApp
mappsapp.shortDescription: Native Android application with integrated Google Maps, real-time geolocation and cloud synchronization.
mappsapp.fullDescription: Advanced Android application for location-based services integrating Google Maps API for interactive map visualization, real-time geolocation, custom markers and routes. Implements user authentication, creation and management of favorite locations, place search, and cloud synchronization with Firebase. Developed with Jetpack Compose and MVVM architecture for a smooth and modern native experience.
features: Complete Google Maps integration with custom controls
Real-time geolocation with dynamically managed permissions
Creation of custom markers on map with detailed information
Place search with Google Places API and autocomplete
Favorite locations management: add, edit, delete and categorize
Cloud data synchronization with Firebase Firestore
User authentication via Firebase Authentication
Route calculation and visualization between locations with Google Directions API
challenges: Integrate Google Maps SDK efficiently with Jetpack Compose (interop with MapView)
Manage complex location permissions on Android robustly
Synchronize location data between local device and Firestore maintaining consistency
Implement place search with responsive and accurate autocomplete
Optimize app performance with multiple markers on map
Handle loading, error and success states in network and geolocation operations
learnings: Advanced Google Maps API integration on Android with Jetpack Compose
Working with Google Places API and Directions API for location services
Runtime permission management on modern Android
Data synchronization with Firebase Firestore and authentication
MVVM architecture for complex Android applications
Real-time geolocation with FusedLocationProviderClient
Interoperability between Jetpack Compose and traditional Views (MapView)
Performance optimization in applications with location services

netflix-content-analysis-ml.title: Netflix Streaming Analytics - ML Content Classification
netflix-content-analysis-ml.shortDescription: Complete data analysis of Netflix catalog with EDA, analytical visualizations and predictive classification model.
netflix-content-analysis-ml.fullDescription: Data analysis and machine learning project applied to the complete Netflix catalog. Includes comprehensive exploratory data analysis (EDA) with interactive visualizations, statistical analysis of content trends, data preprocessing with cleaning and feature engineering, and development of a predictive classification model to categorize content. Implemented with Python, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn and Scikit-learn in Jupyter Notebooks for visual documentation of the complete process.
features: Exploratory data analysis (EDA) of complete Netflix catalog
Interactive visualizations: distributions, temporal trends, correlations
Advanced preprocessing: data cleaning, missing value handling, normalization
Feature engineering: creation of relevant derived variables for classification
Supervised classification model to predict content categories
Model evaluation with metrics (accuracy, precision, recall, F1-score)
Confusion matrix and model error analysis
Complete process documentation in Jupyter Notebook with technical narrative
challenges: Clean and prepare a large dataset with multiple types of inconsistencies and missing values
Design relevant features from textual data (descriptions, genres, etc.)
Select the most appropriate classification model through algorithm comparison
Handle class imbalance in dataset to avoid model biases
Interpret model results clearly and generate actionable insights
Create informative and aesthetically professional visualizations for EDA
learnings: Exploratory data analysis (EDA) with Pandas, Matplotlib and Seaborn
Preprocessing techniques: data cleaning, imputation, normalization
Feature engineering to improve ML model performance
Supervised classification with Scikit-learn (Logistic Regression, Random Forest, SVM)
Model evaluation: classification metrics, cross-validation, hyperparameter tuning
Data visualization: advanced charts, heatmaps, distributions
Technical documentation with Jupyter Notebooks for Data Science projects
Results interpretation and insight generation from data
